Dr. Carmelo Naim

Position: Alumni

Education

  • 2022: PhD in Theoretical Chemistry and Computational Modeling (TCCM), University of Basque Country (UPV/EHU), San Sebastian, Basque Country.
  • 2018: MSc in Fisica della Materia at the University of Pisa, Italy.
  • 2016: BSc in Physics at the University of Pisa, Italy.

Research Topics

  • A joint PhD thesis between Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC) and University of Bordeaux about vdW interactions on nonlinear optical switches.
